attributes.action: Consider the use of birth compulsory control to Impose, through whatever means, restrictions on the ability of certain antisocial elements and criminals, and all under-18s benefit claimants, those lacking basic academic/vocational qualifications to sire or conceive a child until they are deemed suitable for parenthood by fulfilling certain criteria.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The endless stream of new initiatives to educate the uneducatable and employ the unemployable are a complete waste of time - everybody knows that. The only way to solve many of the social problems which cause misery for decent, hard-working people and drain the public purse year on year is to  ensure that the skilled and educated "classes" are allowed, indeed encouraged, to have children, and those who are never going to contribute anything except misery to themselves and others are actively discouraged or prevented.
